text: Claudio Castilla Ruiz (born 30 May 1983) is a Spanish Olympic dressage rider. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro where he finished 38th in the individual and 7th in the team competition. Castilla Ruiz also competed at the 2010 World Equestrian Games and at four editions of European Dressage Championships (in 2009, 2011, 2017 and 2019).
